faqData.question: How can I register my land?
faqData.answer: You need to fill out the Land Registration Form including landowner's name, location, size, price, irrigation source, bank details, and map location.

faqData.question: Why is the landowner's name required?
faqData.answer: It confirms that the land is being posted by the rightful owner.

faqData.question: Which locations can I post land from?
faqData.answer: You can post land from any village, district, or state in India with valid land documents.

faqData.question: Why do I need to provide my mobile number?
faqData.answer: It is needed for communication with interested renters.

faqData.question: Why is land size asked in acres?
faqData.answer: To calculate rent per acre and total rent.

faqData.question: Why are total rent price and rent per acre both required?
faqData.answer: This helps renters understand overall cost and cost per unit area.

faqData.question: What does renting period in months mean?
faqData.answer: It's the number of months you want to rent the land (e.g., 1, 2, 3...).

faqData.question: Why is irrigation source required?
faqData.answer: It tells how suitable the land is for farming — borewell, canal, or rain-fed.

faqData.question: What can be included in extra facilities?
faqData.answer: You can add electricity, tractor, water access, storage, or security.

faqData.question: Why are bank details required?
faqData.answer: So the tenant can transfer rent payments directly to your account.

faqData.question: How to provide Google Map location?
faqData.answer: Open Google Maps → Find your land → Share → Copy link → Paste in the form.

faqData.question: What to fill in 'How did you find location'?
faqData.answer: Mention if you used GPS, known landmarks, or Google Maps to find your land.

faqData.question: How to upload land photos?
faqData.answer: Click the upload section, choose photo from your device, and upload.

faqData.question: Can I upload more than one photo?
faqData.answer: Yes, multiple images can give a better idea of the land condition.

faqData.question: What happens after submitting the form?
faqData.answer: Your details will be verified and shown to suitable renters.

faqData.question: My image is not showing after upload. What should I do?
faqData.answer: Check if the image is under 5MB and in correct format (JPG/PNG). Try re-uploading it.

faqData.question: Form is not submitting. What can be the reason?
faqData.answer: Make sure all required fields are filled properly and your internet is working.

faqData.question: Can I edit details after form submission?
faqData.answer: It depends on the platform settings. Check if there’s an edit option or contact support.

faqData.question: I am not getting any tenant contact. What should I do?
faqData.answer: Make sure your listing is complete and attractive. You can also contact support for help.

faqData.question: Can I fill the form for someone else using my mobile number?
faqData.answer: Yes, you can fill the form on behalf of someone else. Just make sure all land and bank details are correct.

faqData.question: If I post one land, how can I add more?
faqData.answer: You can fill and submit the form again for each new land you want to post.

faqs.question: How can I register my agricultural machine?
faqs.answer: You need to fill the 'Machine Registration Form' which includes details like owner name, mobile number, location (state, district, village), machine purpose, name, specifications, cost, quantity, and machine photo.

faqs.question: Why is the owner's name required?
faqs.answer: It helps in verifying that the machine belongs to a legitimate person and ensures authenticity.

faqs.question: Why do I need to provide a mobile number?
faqs.answer: Your mobile number will be used to contact you for verification or by those interested in hiring your machine.

faqs.question: How do I select my location?
faqs.answer: Choose your State, then your District, and finally your Village from the dropdown menus provided in the form.

faqs.question: What is meant by 'Purpose of Machine'?
faqs.answer: It refers to the agricultural activity the machine is used for, such as ploughing, harvesting, sowing, etc.

faqs.question: What should I write in 'Specification'?
faqs.answer: You can mention details like the machine's capacity, horsepower, brand, or any special feature it has.

faqs.question: What does 'With Tractor' mean?
faqs.answer: It asks whether the machine comes along with a tractor or not, which helps determine overall rental cost and utility.

faqs.question: Why do I need to mention hiring cost per acre and per hour?
faqs.answer: This helps potential users understand how much they will need to pay for using your machine based on usage.

faqs.question: What does 'Quantity of Equipment' refer to?
faqs.answer: It means how many units of the machine you have available for rental or use.

faqs.question: How can I upload the machine photo?
faqs.answer: Click on the 'Upload Machine Photo' section, choose a photo from your device, and upload. Make sure the image size is less than 5MB.

faqs.question: Why is machine photo required?
faqs.answer: A machine photo gives better clarity to the user and helps them visually verify the condition and type of machine.

faqs.question: Can I upload more than one photo?
faqs.answer: If the system allows, yes — multiple photos help in showcasing different angles or parts of the machine.

faqs.question: What happens after form submission?
faqs.answer: Your machine details will be verified and listed for others to view and contact you for rental.

faqData.question: How to register as a labourer?
faqData.answer: Fill the Labour Registration Form with your name, mobile number, age, gender, location, work type, experience, wage, and bank details.

faqData.question: Can I register without uploading a profile picture?
faqData.answer: Yes, but uploading a photo helps in better identification by employers.

faqData.question: My photo is not uploading. What should I do?
faqData.answer: Check if the image is in JPG/PNG format and below 5MB. Try uploading again.

faqData.question: I don’t know my exact age. What should I enter?
faqData.answer: Enter an approximate age. It helps employers understand your eligibility.

faqData.question: Which gender options are available in the form?
faqData.answer: You can select Male or Female as per your identity.

faqData.question: Can I register if I am from a different district or state?
faqData.answer: Yes, you can register from any state, district, or village in India.

faqData.question: What should I select in 'Work Type'?
faqData.answer: Select the type of work you do like farming, construction, loading, etc.

faqData.question: What does 'Experience in years' mean?
faqData.answer: Mention how many years you have been working in your selected field.

faqData.question: What is the wage field for?
faqData.answer: Enter how much payment you expect and choose if it's per day or per hour.

faqData.question: Can I choose both Per Day and Per Hour wages?
faqData.answer: No, select one option that suits your working style.

faqData.question: Why are bank details required?
faqData.answer: So that your wage can be transferred directly to your bank account.

faqData.question: I don’t have a bank account. Can I still register?
faqData.answer: You can register, but bank details are needed for payment through bank transfer.

faqData.question: What is IFSC Code and where can I find it?
faqData.answer: IFSC Code is a unique bank code. You can find it on your passbook or bank's website.

faqData.question: Can I register on behalf of another labourer using my mobile number?
faqData.answer: Yes, you can register for someone else. Just make sure the details are accurate.

faqData.question: If I register one labourer, how do I add more?
faqData.answer: You can submit the form again separately for each labourer.

faqData.question: What is the benefit of creating a labourer profile?
faqData.answer: Creating a labourer profile helps you get more job opportunities. Employers can directly contact you based on your experience, location, and skills. It also makes payment easier through bank transfer.

faqData.question: I selected state and district, but no villages are showing.
faqData.answer: Please ensure your internet connection is stable. If the issue persists, try reloading the page or selecting the state and district again.

faqData.question: Land listings are not updating after I apply filters.
faqData.answer: Click on the “Apply Filter” button after setting all filter values. If still not working, clear filters and try again.

faqData.question: Filter results show the same land multiple times.
faqData.answer: This could be due to duplicate entries. Please report the issue using the contact form.

faqData.question: I want to filter land with a specific irrigation source like 'River', but no results are shown.
faqData.answer: The platform shows only available lands based on your filter. Try selecting multiple irrigation sources or changing location.

faqData.question: The land price is showing as 0 or blank.
faqData.answer: This means the land owner hasn’t provided the price. You can still contact them via the 'Contact' button for details.

faqData.question: I clicked on 'Book' but nothing happened.
faqData.answer: Please make sure you are logged in. Booking actions may require user authentication.

faqData.question: How to contact landowner?
faqData.answer: Click on the “Contact” button next to the land listing. It will show contact details or allow you to send a message.

faqData.question: Facilities like Electricity/Storage are not showing for some lands.
faqData.answer: If the land doesn’t have those facilities, they won’t appear. Look for lands where 'Facilities' are mentioned explicitly.

faqData.question: I want to post my own land for listing. How can I do that?
faqData.answer: Go to the “Post Land” section and fill the required details like location, size, price, irrigation, and facilities.

faqData.question: Applied filters are not being reset.
faqData.answer: There should be a “Clear Filters” button (if not, it's recommended to add one). Alternatively, reload the page.

faqData.question: Why is the land size shown only in acres?
faqData.answer: Currently, we support acres as the unit. More units like hectares may be added in future updates.

faqData.question: Page looks broken on mobile or is hard to use.
faqData.answer: Try rotating your phone to landscape mode or zooming out. If the problem continues, please report it to support.

faqData.question: I selected state and district, but no villages are showing.
faqData.answer: Ensure you have a stable internet connection. Try re-selecting the state and district or reload the page.

faqData.question: I selected purpose and machine, but no results are showing.
faqData.answer: If no machines match the selected filters, try broadening your filter criteria or change the location.

faqData.question: The machine list is not updating after applying filters.
faqData.answer: Make sure to click the 'Apply Filter' button after selecting your filters. If the issue persists, try clearing the filters and applying again.

faqData.question: Why are the same machines showing up multiple times?
faqData.answer: This might be due to duplicate entries in the database. Please report it via the contact/support form.

faqData.question: What is the difference between 'Cost per Acre' and 'Cost per Hour'?
faqData.answer: 'Cost per Acre' is for tasks based on area covered, while 'Cost per Hour' is time-based. Choose what fits your requirement.

faqData.question: Can I hire a machine with a tractor?
faqData.answer: Yes, if the machine is available with a tractor, it will be mentioned in the listing.

faqData.question: I clicked on 'Book' but nothing happened.
faqData.answer: Please make sure you are logged in. Booking machines may require login authentication.

faqData.question: How do I contact the machine owner?
faqData.answer: Click the 'Contact' button next to the machine listing to view contact details or send a message.

faqData.question: Some machines don’t show any cost details.
faqData.answer: If the cost is missing, it may not be updated by the owner. You can still contact them for more information.

faqData.question: I want to list my machine for hiring. How can I do that?
faqData.answer: Go to the 'Post Machine' section and enter machine name, purpose, cost, location, and other details to list your machine.

faqData.question: Filters are not resetting after applying.
faqData.answer: Use the 'Clear Filters' button if available. If not, reloading the page will reset the filters.

faqData.question: Page looks broken or doesn’t work properly on mobile.
faqData.answer: Try refreshing the page or using landscape mode. For persistent issues, report them to the support team.

faqData.question: I selected state and district, but no villages are appearing.
faqData.answer: Please check your internet connection. Try reselecting the state and district or refresh the page.

faqData.question: No labourers are showing after I apply filters.
faqData.answer: This may happen if no labourers match your selected filters. Try changing work type, experience, or location to see more results.

faqData.question: The labour listings are not updating after applying filters.
faqData.answer: Ensure you click the 'Apply Filter' button after choosing all options. If the issue continues, clear filters and try again.

faqData.question: Why do I see duplicate labour profiles?
faqData.answer: This could be due to duplicate entries. Please report it using the contact/support form.

faqData.question: What is the difference between wage per day and wage per hour?
faqData.answer: 'Wage per day' is for full-day work, while 'wage per hour' is for short-term or part-time work. Choose based on your requirement.

faqData.question: Some labourers don’t show wage information.
faqData.answer: If the wage is not visible, the labourer might not have added it. You can still contact them for details.

faqData.question: I clicked on 'Hire' but nothing happened.
faqData.answer: You may need to log in before hiring. Make sure you're signed in to proceed.

faqData.question: How do I contact a labourer?
faqData.answer: Click the 'Contact' button next to the labour profile. It will show contact info or open a message form.

faqData.question: How can I find labourers with specific experience?
faqData.answer: Enter the minimum years of experience required in the filter before clicking 'Apply Filter'.

faqData.question: Filters are not resetting.
faqData.answer: Use the 'Clear Filters' option if available or reload the page to reset all filters.

faqData.question: The page doesn't work properly on mobile.
faqData.answer: Try rotating your phone or zooming out. If the issue continues, report it to the support team.

faqData.question: I want to list myself or someone else as a labourer. How can I do that?
faqData.answer: Go to the 'Register Labour' section and fill in the required details like name, work type, experience, wage, and location.
